testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed And user select gender type.................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter valid email"omar15fire@gmail.com"............................passed And user enter his Company name.............................................passed And user enter valid Password"654321".......................................passed And user fills Confirm Password field.......................................passed When user clicks on register button.........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user enter valid email"omar15fire@gmail.com"............................passed And user enter valid Password"654321".......................................passed When user press on login button.............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user couldn't login with Invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user enter invalid email field..........................................passed And user enter invalid Password field.......................................passed When user press on login button.............................................passed Then user couldn't login to the system......................................passed

testcase.name: user could select euro currency
testcase.system-out: When user select “Euro” from currency dropdown..............................passed Then euro sign are found through all products in homepage...................passed

testcase.classname: user check the correctness of the two sliders
testcase.name: verify that guest user could click in slider wrapper

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Nokia expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
When user select first slider...............................................passed Then nokia page open........................................................failed When user select second slider..............................................skipped Then iphone page open.......................................................skipped
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: Nokia expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:46) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:30) at org.example.stepDefs.D06_homeSlidersStepDef.nokia(D06_homeSlidersStepDef.java:21) at ✽.nokia page open(file:///D:/FWD/demonopcommerce/src/main/resources/features/F06_homeSliders.feature:5)
